nodes.text: Jungle Ghost was an Ithorian Herdship.
Jungle Ghost was similar to almost every other Ithorian Herdship, being a huge flattened ball which was designed to simulate the jungles of Ithor, the Ithorian homeworld, in a space-worthy vessel.
Jungle Ghost visited the systems along the Corellian Run. It would often disappear into Wild Space for months at a time and then return with a variety of fascinating and rare trade goods.
